tables.table_schema:
CREATE TABLE conflicts_of_interest (
    id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    researcher_name VARCHAR(255),
    department VARCHAR(255),
    research_topic VARCHAR(255),
    conflict_description TEXT,
    date_reported DATE
);

CREATE TABLE conflicts_of_interest (
	employee_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
	researcher_name VARCHAR(100) NOT NULL,
	conflict_description TEXT,
	research_topic VARCHAR(255),
	related_projects VARBINARY
);

CREATE TABLE conflict_reviews (
	review_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
	employee_id INT,
	conflict_id INT,
	review_date TIMESTAMP,
	review_result ENUM('Approved','Denied')
);

CREATE TABLE research_projects (
	project_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
	project_title VARCHAR(255) NOT NULL,
	project_description TEXT,
	start_date DATE,
	end_date DATE
);

CREATE TABLE ethics_review_board (
	id INT PRIMARY KEY,
	researcher_id INT,
	conflict_type TEXT,
	date_reported DATE
)

CREATE TABLE researchers (
	id INT PRIMARY KEY,
	name TEXT,
	email TEXT,
	institution TEXT
)

CREATE TABLE conflicts (
	id INT PRIMARY KEY,
	researcher_id INT,
	conflict_description TEXT,
	date_added DATE
)

CREATE TABLE institutions (
	id INT PRIMARY KEY,
	name TEXT,
	location TEXT
)

CREATE TABLE review_status (
	id INT PRIMARY KEY,
	conflict_id INT,
	status TEXT,
	date_updated DATE
)
